main event: One large white object which turned yellow prior to burning out was observed over Glouster, Mass. for 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object was larger than a shooting star., The object had a long white tail which turned yellow before burning out., The sighting was reported by seamen on watch at the Glouster Lifeboat Station and from a Coast Guard cutter., There were additional calls reported to the Boston Globe regarding the sighting in the general area., The object burned out and appeared to break into two pieces.
sighted object: a large white object with a long white tail
witness description: seamen from a lifeboat station and a Coast Guard cutter
